Today, it’s all about platforms like Instagram and Facebook — but there are still many talented people who aren't active on these platforms.

This small idea can be transformed into an app, where users simply register themselves and get opportunities to contribute to community events and shows.

Technology can help bring all this talent together in one place, making it easier to organize and run events with local or lesser-known contributors.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Sometimes, it’s not possible for everyone to bring in a popular star, MC, host, or someone who can drive the event and run the show with a full setup.
This idea is more about bringing hidden or local talent together — creating a platform for them to shine, even with limited resources.
